DOC.detailed_description: The addition nutritional therapy standardize physical therapy program , may expedite recovery shoulder injury . An attractive feature approach development efficacious adjunct therapy economically superior traditional therapy modality logistically feasible .
DOC.criteria: Between 1865 year old Diagnosed rotator cuff injury treat surgically Have receive previous injection therapy ( plateletrich plasma corticosteroid injection ) within previous 6 month Have use follow supplement previous 2 week : Vitamin C D , protein supplement Have poorly control type I type II diabetes ( HgB A1C > 9.5 % ) renal insufficiency ( GFR < 60 ml/min ) . Have inability participate rehabilitation exercise .
